name: query
description: This operation allows a user to perform aggregate queries on data held within the FHIR server by specifying aggregation, grouping and filter expressions.

parameter.name: subjectResource
parameter.documentation: A URI that defines the subject resource that the expressions within this query are evaluated against

parameter.name: aggregation
parameter.documentation: A description of a function which is used to calculate a summary value from each grouping of values

part.name: expression
part.documentation: A FHIRPath expression that defines the aggregation function

part.name: label
part.documentation: A short description for the aggregation, for display purposes

parameter.name: grouping
parameter.documentation: A description of how to group data into groups within the query result

part.name: expression
part.documentation: A FHIRPath expression that can be evaluated against each resource in the data set to determine which groupings it should be counted within

part.name: label
part.documentation: A short description for the grouping, for display purposes

parameter.name: filter
parameter.documentation: A FHIRPath expression that can be evaluated against each resource in the data set to determine whether it is included within the result

parameter.name: grouping
parameter.documentation: The grouped results of the aggregations requested in the query

part.name: label
part.documentation: The set of descriptive labels that describe this grouping, and correspond to those requested in the query

part.name: result
part.documentation: The set of values that resulted from the execution of the aggregations that were requested in the query
